00054 function introspectHooks($level=NULL)
00055 {
00056     if ($level!=NULL)
00057         if (!defined('HOOK_' . strtoupper($level)))
00058             throw new leaf_Exception("Unknown Hook Level!");
00059     
00060     static $allHooks;
00061 
00062     if ($allHooks==NULL)
00063         $allHooks = leaf_Registry::getInstance()->config->hooks;
00064 
00065     if ($level!=NULL)
00066         return $allHooks[$level];
00067     else
00068         return $allHooks;
00069 }
